item.title: Hyperion
item.description: Pwning Pocket Tanks - Hyperion [Google CTF 2017 Finals] Author : Gynvael Coldwind Language : C/C++ Upload : May 9th, 2018 Level : I will rate it 8/10 Platform : Server: Linux | Client: Windows/Linux etc. Files : change the link hyperion Desc: - It's 2017, so even single-player games require Internet connection. Hyperion was one of the pwn challenges from Google CTF 2017 Finals. One day I randomly asked Gynvael (who is the author of this challenge) to give me some CTF challenges.
